result.reason: Running mRemoteNG from a WebDAV-mounted drive is blocked by .NET security zone policy (network-loaded assemblies are restricted) and the connection config XML I/O assumes a standard local/UNC filesystem path; supporting WebDAV natively would require significant abstraction work for a very niche use case.
result.approach: Recommend users map the WebDAV share as a network drive letter or use local sync (e.g. OneDrive/rclone) and point mRemoteNG at the synced local path instead.
